product_name: NYX Professional MakeupBare With Me Hydrating Face & Body Concealer Serum
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackSay hello to 24HR hydration with NYX Professional Makeup Bare With Me Concealer. Dark circles? Erased! Acne? Covered! Redness & irritations? Girl, bye!
details: DetailsBenefitsMedium coverage concealer in a skincare serum for face and bodySay goodbye to skin stress and hello to covered and hydrated skinAvailable in 13 ultra-hydrating shades with a medium coverage, non-cakey natural finishMade for your under-eye, face, and body covering dark circles, redness, acne and dry patchesInfused with skin-loving ingredients including tremella mushroom, cica, and green tea for up to 24 hours of ultra hydration for skin that feels moisturized all daySmooth natural finish with a lightweight feel, for skin that looks like skin in an instantEasy, mess-free application - get undetectable medium coverage in one pump100% vegan formula* (no animal-derived ingredients or by productsCruelty freeKey IngredientsInfused with tremella mushroom, cica, and green tea for up to 24 hours of ultra hydrationShadesFair, Light, Vanilla, Beige, Golden, Tan, Medium, Sand, Deep Golden, Camel, Mocha, Rich, DeepItem 2587594How To UseSkin stress? Not today! Cover and hydrate by applying one pump of Bare With Me Concealer Serum to the skin using a blending brush. Apply two pumps on problem areas (dark circles, acne/blemishes, redness/irritations, dry patches) for medium coverage.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Glycerin, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Butylene Glycol, Silica, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil, Tremella Fuciformis Polysaccharide, Centella Asiatica Extract, Allantoin, Sorbitan Olivate, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Sodium Chloride, Magnesium Sulfate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol [+/- May Contain: CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide].
how_to_use: Skin stress? Not today! Cover and hydrate by applying one pump of Bare With Me Concealer Serum to the skin using a blending brush. Apply two pumps on problem areas (dark circles, acne/blemishes, redness/irritations, dry patches) for medium coverage.
ingredients: Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Lightweight serum like concealer that lasts all day
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] As someone with perpetually dry undereyes who battles concealer creasing by noon, the NYX Bare With Me Concealer Serum has been a game-changer. The concealer isn't think and it feels like a serum-makeup hybrid, gliding on effortlessly without dragging or clinging to dry patches. Infused with skin-soothing Cica and Tremella mushroom, it delivers a comfortable, all-day hydration while its medium, buildable pigment effectively knocks out dark shadows and redness. The finish is beautifully natural and skin-like, resisting settling into fine lines better than any high-end product I've tried, making it my new go-to for a quick, non-cakey everyday routine.

reviews.headline: A+ affordable concealer
reviews.comments: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. The packaging is slim and convenient to carry or keep at home. This concealer comes out appearing thick but is super spreadable and blends like a concealer should.

reviews.headline: Perfect shade!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love this concealer so much it blends beautifully and really does an amazing job brightening up my under eyes. I love the consistency. It makes it so easy to apply and it stays on all day.

reviews.headline: Ok
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I was expecting more from this concealer with how hyped its been. The coverage is light to medium depending on how thick you apply it. It does feel nice and hydrating with a dewy finish until you set it. Lasts for a while, just doesn't give enough coverage for my skin.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: Good product, price is great. Coverage was covered pretty well with this concealer, the color was right on point. I definitely recommend this product.

reviews.headline: I really, really like this serum concealer.
reviews.comments:
I received this product for free from NYX Professional Makeup and Influenst er for free in exchange for my honest review. 

I have been using the shade medium vanilla and as you can see it is a pretty good match for me. The formula wears nicely through the day with a very skin like finish. I'd say it is light to medium coverage and not super buildable. I love it for traveling, I don't bring a foundation and use this wear I want to cover redness or just even things out. I typically set the middle of my face and haven't had any issues with my skin or under eyes looking extra textured with this product like I do with others. There is no discernible scent. Only qualm I have is the pump can easily spit out more product than you need and it can make the cap a bit gunky after time. Otherwise, I really this as a lighter coverage, easy going, affordable and accessible option.

reviews.headline: Would recommend
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Lightweight, creamy, and easy to blend! Bare With Me concealer gives natural coverage that brightens under eyes without creasing. Perfect for everyday wear and feels like skin, not makeup.

reviews.headline: Love this for everyday !
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Lightweight yet buildable coverage that blends seamlessly, feels hydrating, and looks natural all day—absolutely love it! smells great !!!

reviews.headline: Instantly lifts and brightens!
reviews.comments: Nyx is one of my favorite makeup brands. I love the variety of products they carry. Their new Bear with me concealer serum does exactly what a good concealer is supposed to do. It instantly refreshes and brightens your under eyes. You can use it all over your face to conceal imperfections or use it to conceal your under eyes. It does both the things perfectly! I love that it leaves my skin looking vibrant and flawless! I highly recommend this concealer.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments:
New addition for my make up routine
I received this product in exchange of my honest opinion about it and I could say that I definitely loved it! NYX Bare with Me Concelear does not clog pores and hide dark circles, hyperpigmentation on the face. The concealer covers all what needed to be covered and yet it feels very light on the face. 
I love the texture on this product and it's very easy to blend into skin. Great quality for great price.

reviews.headline: Woah
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] First off can we just take a moment to look how amazing my skin looks at my under eyes. The coverage on this is absolutely insane. I am absolutely glowing. I love the texture It is not tacky, and there's no weird scent. And honestly for the price point this is really cheap for what you get a little goes a long way trust me on that because when I first started pumping it out, I definitely used way too much.

reviews.headline: Holy grail concealer!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This concealer delivers incredible coverage while feeling ultra-light and hydrating. It blends effortlessly—no tugging, no fuss—and leaves a smooth, natural finish that lasts all day. If you struggle with dry under-eyes or cakey formulas, this is a must-have. It wears beautifully without creasing or settling. I've recommended it to all my friends, and I'll keep repurchasing. Highly recommend! ♥️

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again for the rest of my life
reviews.comments: The NYX Bear With Me Concealer Serum is a game-changer for anyone seeking a natural, radiant look. It's amazing for those no-makeup days, it effectively blurs imperfections without feeling heavy or cakey. It's perfect for evening out skin tone, covering very dark circles under the eyes, and concealing minor blemishes. Overall, it's a fantastic option for achieving a dewy, fresh-faced appearance with minimal effort. It's super affordable and the best drugstore concealer out there giving you a finish that is just as good if not better than high end makeup.

reviews.headline: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I liked it a lot, it has a good coverage and texture and an excellent finish because I liked the result. The price seems very good to me since it is quite affordable. The packaging is nice and functional. It has no fragrance.

reviews.headline: A Concealer That Feels Like Skincare
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been testing the NYX Bare With Me Concealer Serum and honestly, it surprised me in the best way. It's super lightweight but still gives enough coverage to hide my dark circles and little imperfections. What I love most is that it doesn't feel heavy or cakey - more like a serum that hydrates while it conceals. My skin feels fresh, not dry and it blends in so easily for that natural, "no-makeup makeup" look. Definitely one I'll keep reaching for!

reviews.headline: Highly recommend for everyday makeup
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using the NYX Bare With Me Concealer Serum for a few weeks now, and I'm really impressed! It has a lightweight, hydrating formula that blends beautifully into the skin—perfect for days when I want coverage without feeling cakey or heavy. It gives a natural finish that looks like skin, not makeup, which I love for everyday wear.
The serum-like texture is very smooth and easy to apply, and it doesn't settle into fine lines or dry patches. It's also great for under the eyes and around redness or blemishes. I appreciate that it's infused with skin-loving ingredients, and it feels more like skincare than traditional concealer.

reviews.headline: This is the best concealer I have ever used!
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review.This NYX concealer serum is legitimately the best concealer I have ever tried. This is nearly full coverage without the heavy feeling. This concealer is so light and airy to the point where it doesn't feel like I'm wearing concealer. I can very easily apply this with my fingers, a sponge, or a brush. It doesn't settle into fine lines, so I just need a light dusting of powder to set it. I have used this for well over 30 days at this point and I have barely made a dent in the tube, so I know it will last a long time. This is overall amazing.

reviews.headline: Flawless coverage
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This concealer really does the job, especially for any desired full coverage look! Its formula is extremely creamy and a little definitely goes a long way, but the coverage is amazing! Not only does is blend beautifully, but it leaves such flawless results. There's no scent. The pump dispenser makes is so easy to use. This concealer actually lasted all day and didn't crease!

reviews.headline: Super versatile!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have tried every kind of concealer on the market for years and I really really love this formula. I love that this concealer is super lightweight and you can use it as thin layer and have a very light wash of pigment, but you can also layer it on to get more coverage and it doesn't feel cakey or heavy at all. I also really love the packaging because it makes me feel like the concealer is staying fresh and also no bacteria getting in there. I really love using this concealer not just for my under eyes and my blemishes but also for contour and just overall complexion.

reviews.headline: Approve
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Ayyy! One of the best and affordable concealer out there. It hides my imperfect spots and makes my skin look perfectly fine. It blends well and doesn't give me any skin issues. Girls, I recommend this product!

faceoff_positive.comments: I actually enjoy the texture of the concealer. I like the fact that it's a bit thinner so it doesn't look/feel heavy, i set everso lightly under my eyes with a translucent finely milled powder/ quick dust NO bake. The older you get the less you want to wear. The Only issue I have with the concealer is the shade selection. Luckily I'm a beautician and I'm able to eyeball the colors. I mix "Beige & tan" to get a perfect peachy undertone. It helps with darkness without needing to color correct.
faceoff_positive.headline: More tertiary colors needed. Great for mature

faceoff_negative.comments: There's pros and cons for sure. I have light neutral, olive-leaning skin and got the shade light. I find that it leans more pink than neutral. I really wish it leaned more neutral, so I could use it on other parts of my face in a pinch. On me, this isn't a brightening shade for my under eyes, but it does cancel out some of the darkness a bit (because it leans more pink). The other thing about this concealer is the packaging. I understand that the pump helps to promote the *serum* vibe in this, but would really LOVE a standard doe foot for ease. These are the reasons I won't repurchase, but would recommend to those looking for a relatively affordable lightweight concealer with good coverage and feels silky-soft under the eyes--truly does feel high-end. If you can find a color that suits you and don't mind the packaging, then it's a great choice.
faceoff_negative.headline: A few things I wish were different.

rollup.name: Bare With Me Hydrating Face & Body Concealer Serum
